name: Book a 10to8 appointment from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically book a new 10to8 appointment. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/181PKCuO08BsaZeeYvKfvzJVFA6RMAWLZzTi9gnxURKw/edit?usp=sharing).
